snippet.title: KINGDOM HEARTS 2020 Trailer
snippet.description:
2020 promises to be a magical year for KINGDOM HEARTS!

From June 22nd KINGDOM HEARTS fans can explore the mysteries of a teenage Xehanort in KINGDOM HEARTS Union χ Dark Road, a brand-new, original story experience for mobile devices. 

Additionally, the KINGDOM HEARTS III original soundtrack will be available globally in Fall 2020.  It features many of the unforgettable and timeless tracks from the critically acclaimed KINGDOM HEARTS III!

Coming this year, KINGDOM HEARTS Melody of Memory is an all-new rhythm-action game that will provide fans with an unmissable opportunity to relive their favorite moments like never before!

To learn more about these exciting additions to KINGDOM HEARTS visit: www.kingdomhearts.com

Be sure to follow us to keep up to date with everything Kingdom Hearts related: 
Twitter - https://twitter.com/KingdomHearts 
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/KingdomHearts
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/KingdomHearts
YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/KingdomHearts
